ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Our organisation started with running a school for the lower middle class children. Then we diversified our social contribution works and we started vocational training of the tribal boys and girls living in the nearby villages. Since last year, we saw that the tribals cut trees for getting firewood and the option of LPG was not viable as it was beyond their pockets. We made simple solar cookers by using thick card boards and aluminium foils. Initially we distributed these solar cookers for free to 12 families in 3 villages and now we have started charging only Rs 101/- from each family for the same. The cost is much higher than that but we take this small amount so that they must also feel pride of this and use it for sure. We are also making documentaries on environment conservation and sustainable development. One such documentary has been awarded as Special Jury Award at the Eco Film Festival held at Boondi in Rajasthan on January 22, 2017

sourceOfFunds.purpose: A self-help group (SHG) is a financial intermediary committee usually composed of 10 to 20 local women or men between 18 to 40 years. Most self-help groups are located in India, though SHGs can be found in other countries, especially in South Asia and Southeast Asia. SHG is nothing but a group of people who are on daily wages, they form a group and from that group one person collects the money and gives the money to the person who is in need. Members also make small regular savings contribution

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: With the growing demand of the skill enhancement in every field of work all over the world India is never a step backward to impart training to every sector of the society Keeping this trend in view Sum yugantar shikshan avam samaj kalyan Samiti has spread its hand to work for the betterment of youth and women in the best possible way yugantar shikshan avam samaj kalian samiti is an NGO which is dedicatedly working to enhance the skill of every youth and women from the Madhya Pradesh We provide one platform to every individual who is striving to mark their presence in the society with their working potential We ensure our success by conducting different vocational training programmes across the country Upon catering the vulnerable section of the society our organization maximizes the potential of the youth and women by affecting their lives in a clean hygiene and secure environment For Youth Our unique skill delivery process begins with the identification of jobs and ends with the placement of trained youth in various manufacturing industry We aim to ensure that every youth leaves with a qualification that is recognized and is valued by the employers Our training will ultimately provide them with the skills necessary to succeed at work from the day one
